item.title: Heather add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "There is only one page left to write on. I will fill it with words of only one syllable. I love. I have loved. I will love." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Heather add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is not time or opportunity that is to determine intimacy;â€”it is disposition alone. Seven years would be insufficient to make some people acquainted with each other, and seven days are more than enough for others." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Heather add a quote by Boris Pasternak
item.description: "When a great moment knocks on the door of your life, it is often no louder than the beating of your heart, and it is very easy to miss it. " -- Boris Pasternak

item.title: Heather add a quote by Jericho Pasaoa
item.description: "It's okay to be a loser, these are people who tried to blend in with the world, still get the disrespect he doesn't deserve. decides to be just themselves. and still there's a girl you dream about, has someone else." -- Jericho Pasaoa
